title: Motivation and Learning Strategy Design in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary learning strategies and experience with digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: A non-degree program for working professionals focusing on strengthening job competencies within social contexts, measuring practical application skills through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can specifically explain three or more strategies for maintaining motivation in blended learning environments.
Learners can analyze motivation change patterns at each stage of the course and establish personalized strategies.
Learners can design self-directed learning strategies using digital tools and apply them to project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
